title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Mastering Programming Fundamentals: Automated Continuous Learning System

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Computer Literacy and Ability to Understand Simple Logic
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Participants can write problem-solving code at three difficulty levels using basic Python syntax (variables, conditionals, loops).
Participants experience the entire process of submitting weekly assignments, receiving automated assessments, and feedback through the GitHub Classroom integration system at least three times.
Participants analyze the visualization process of five or more basic algorithms (e.g., sorting, searching) in a VR simulation environment with over 80% accuracy.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
